trans-unit.source: Set Up Payment Methods| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Payment Methods| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Nastavení způsobu platby| Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You use payment methods, for example, check, bank transfer, cash, or PayPal, to define how sales and purchase invoices will be paid.

seg-source.mrk: You use payment methods, for example, check, bank transfer, cash, or PayPal, to define how sales and purchase invoices will be paid.

target.mrk: Můžete použít různé metody způsobu platby, například šek, bankovní převod, hotovost nebo PayPal, k určení, jak byly prodejní a nákupní faktury zaplacené.

trans-unit.source: Defining Payment Methods

seg-source.mrk: Defining Payment Methods

target.mrk: Definování způsobu platby

trans-unit.source: Payment methods define the way you prefer for customers to pay you, and how you like to pay your vendors.

seg-source.mrk: Payment methods define the way you prefer for customers to pay you, and how you like to pay your vendors.

target.mrk: Způsoby platby definují, jaký způsob platby od zákazníků preferujete a jak chcete platit svým dodavatelům.

trans-unit.source: The method can vary for each customer or vendor.

seg-source.mrk: The method can vary for each customer or vendor.

target.mrk: Metody se mohou u každého zákazníka a dodavatele lišit.

trans-unit.source: Examples of typical payment methods are **bank**, **cash**, **check**, or **account**.

seg-source.mrk: Examples of typical payment methods are **bank**, **cash**, **check**, or **account**.

target.mrk: Mezi typické způsoby platby patří **banka**, **hotovost**, **šek**, nebo **účet**.

trans-unit.source: You can assign a payment method to customers and vendors so that the same method is always used on the sales and purchase documents you create for them.

seg-source.mrk: You can assign a payment method to customers and vendors so that the same method is always used on the sales and purchase documents you create for them.

target.mrk: Zákazníkům a dodavatelům můžete přiřadit způsob platby, tak, aby se stejný způsob vždy použil u prodejních a nákupních faktur, které pro ně vytvoříte.

trans-unit.source: If needed, you can change the method on the sales or purchase document.

seg-source.mrk: If needed, you can change the method on the sales or purchase document.

target.mrk: V případě potřeby můžete způsob změnit přímo na prodejní nebo nákupní faktuře.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to pay a particular purchase invoice in cash rather than by check.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if you want to pay a particular purchase invoice in cash rather than by check.

target.mrk: Například pokud chcete platit konkrétní nákupní fakturu v hotovosti, a nikoli šekem.

trans-unit.source: This does not change the default payment method assigned to the vendor.

seg-source.mrk: This does not change the default payment method assigned to the vendor.

target.mrk: Tímto se nezmění výchozí způsob platby přiřazený dodavateli.

trans-unit.source: The same payment methods are used for sales and purchase documents.

seg-source.mrk: The same payment methods are used for sales and purchase documents.

target.mrk: Stejné způsoby platby se používají pro prodejní a nákupní faktury.

trans-unit.source: For example, a _cash_ payment method is used both when you make payments and when you receive them.

seg-source.mrk: For example, a _cash_ payment method is used both when you make payments and when you receive them.

target.mrk: Například, způsob platby v _hotovosti_ se používá jak při provádění plateb, tak při jejich přijímání.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] knows that when you are creating a sales invoice you expect to receive payment, and the opposite for purchase invoices.

seg-source.mrk: knows that when you are creating a sales invoice you expect to receive payment, and the opposite for purchase invoices.

target.mrk: ví, že když vytváříte prodejní fakturu očekáváte platbu, a opak zase u nákupních faktur.

trans-unit.source: Credit memos for returns, however, are exceptions because money is flowing in the opposite directions, from you to your customer and from your vendor to you.

seg-source.mrk: Credit memos for returns, however, are exceptions because money is flowing in the opposite directions, from you to your customer and from your vendor to you.

target.mrk: Vratky z dobropisu na vrácení jsou však výjimkami, protože peníze tečou opačným směrem, od vás k vašemu zákazníkovi a od vašeho dodavatele k vám.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a default payment method is not assigned to credit memos.

seg-source.mrk: Therefore, a default payment method is not assigned to credit memos.

target.mrk: Výchozí způsob platby proto není k dobropisům přiřazen.

trans-unit.source: There is, however, a workaround if you have specified terms of payment for the customer or vendor.

seg-source.mrk: There is, however, a workaround if you have specified terms of payment for the customer or vendor.

target.mrk: Pokud jste však určili platební podmínky pro zákazníka nebo dodavatele, tak zde existuje řešení.

trans-unit.source: Though the **Calc. Pmt. Disc. on Cr. Memos** field is not intended for this, if you choose the check box on the **Payment Terms** page a default payment method will be added when you create a credit memo.

seg-source.mrk: Though the **Calc.
Pmt.
Disc. on Cr.
Memos** field is not intended for this, if you choose the check box on the **Payment Terms** page a default payment method will be added when you create a credit memo.

target.mrk: Přes **kalk.
LM
Skonto na dobropisu
Pole Dobropisy** není k tomuto určeno. Pokud na stránce **Platební podmínky** zaškrtnete políčko, při vytváření dobropisu se přidá výchozí způsob platby.

trans-unit.source: To set up a payment method

seg-source.mrk: To set up a payment method

target.mrk: Nastavení způsobu platby

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] provides a few payment methods that businesses often use.

seg-source.mrk: provides a few payment methods that businesses often use.

target.mrk: poskytuje několik platebních metod, které podniky často používají.

trans-unit.source: You can, however, add as many as you need.

seg-source.mrk: You can, however, add as many as you need.

target.mrk: Můžete jich však přidat tolik, kolik potřebujete.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Payment Methods**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Payment Methods**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Způsob platby ** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: Fill in the fields as necessary.

target.mrk: Vyplňte pole podle potřeby.

trans-unit.source: To assign a payment method to a customer or vendor

seg-source.mrk: To assign a payment method to a customer or vendor

target.mrk: K přiřazení platební metody zákazníkovi nebo prodejci

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Customer** or **Vendor**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Customer** or **Vendor**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Zákazník**, nebo **Dodavatel** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: In the **Payment Method** field, choose the method to use by default for the customer or vendor.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Payment Method** field, choose the method to use by default for the customer or vendor.

target.mrk: V poli **Způsob platby** vyberte metodu, která se použije jako výchozí pro zákazníka, nebo dodavatele.
